website_summaries.verdict: This compact, over-the-shoulder bag is perfect for day trips or carrying around everyday items.
pros: Single strap design enables this pack to be easily carried in front or behind you
Multiple pockets, including several exterior pockets for easy access
Switch the bag from your left to your right hand side or vice versa
cons: This bag is too small if you're looking for something that can hold several days' worth of gear

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I researched similar bags, but this one in particular had good reviews so I decided to purchased it. I utilize this bag as my every day carry/purse and I love it so far. It seems to be made very well. The bag has plenty of compartments for my items. I like that I can display my favorite patches on the front. The back pocket fits my 9MM Sig Sauer and it has a snap that allows for quick access. I am very pleased with my purchase...especially for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Only taking a star away because the pics made it look bigger
customer_reviews.text: Great little shoulder bag, the views on the website made it look bigger than it really was (maybe a smaller guy is wearing it), I'm really tall and I dwarf this thing, but it's pretty awesome and would be perfect for carrying a gun and additional items or great for going on a hike. (see video)
customer_reviews.author: Hakarune

customer_reviews.title: Good product but damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I have several positives about this backpack. 1. The size is great small yet ample space for items. 2. Sturdy material 3. The strap is heavy duty and doesn't feel cheap 4. Lots of pockets My largest issue is when it arrived the zipper was already off the track on the front pouch. So, its going to be sent back because I can't zip the front shut.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sport ling clays
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional little bag for the money. I bought it to use for sporting clays so that I wouldn’t have to carry anything other than my shotgun. It holds 4 boxes of 12ga in the main pocket with ease (attached photo is with 4 full boxes in it) and has a nice front pocket for ear pro and chokes. It can be used on either shoulder, so you can keep it on when shouldering the shotgun. Extremely happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: FuntimeFandrew

customer_reviews.title: OK but small.
customer_reviews.text: Its put together fairly well. As others have said retie the pulls or you will lose them. As far as size goes I was expecting it to be small and only planned on carrying my lunch and prescriptions to work everyday. Having said that, the front pockets are big enought to hold a couple of prescriptions. The big pocket will hold a banana and a couple of sandwiches but not much else. To small for a water bottle and foodtogether. You may have another use for this bag but that should give you an idea of the size. The main pocket is 10"x6"x3". I will include a picture to show the size
customer_reviews.author: Zomb

customer_reviews.title: These were a HIT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 8 of these backpacks (various colors) as Christmas gifts. They were such a huge hit that other people were asking for them. Hubby also got a bag (CP Camo) and he takes it everywhere. He absolutely loves it and tells all his friends about it. Now we've gotten about 14 requests for these bags. He said that the bags are built very well. They're rugged and can handle a good beating. These are definitely a great buy. Also, I contacted the seller (several times) with questions prior to purchasing. They were very prompt in responding and very helpful. I would definitely buy from them again and look forward to purchasing more of their items in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Aliana

customer_reviews.title: Look doesn’t match quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked this bag a lot initially and travels with it on a few flights. Now I’m about to head to an airport and see the bottom seam has come apart. Looks like it’s not as rugged as it is made to look. Very disappointed as the size and utility was good. Just not the quality.
customer_reviews.author: J.T. M.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Great little pack. Used it for 6 days at Disney. Holds 2 water bottles, 4 ponchos, an umbrella, car keys, with room left in the big compartment. Big cell phone booster charger, sun screen, charging cable, medicine, and other small items in the second pocket. Comb, gift cards, and other stuff in the small front pocket. Bought for day hikes but this was easier than a backpack and holds tons of stuff. Really happy with the purchase. You can also wear as a fanny pack and it’s comforitable. Wore to work a few days as well, my Glock 19 fits well in the back pocket. Easy to draw from.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: It's like the material is breaking down. I loved this bag too. I carried it every day. It's literally falling apart after 2 months. It seems rugged but it just can't keep up. I guess I got what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Ben DeRosa

customer_reviews.title: A Mixed Bag Review
customer_reviews.text: I've received a number of compliments on the bag - hence 4 stars. I am a BIG guy and the strap extends and it fits me. It is very convenient although I wish it was a tad larger. I cannot give it 5 stars because the zippers sometimes come apart and then it fixes itself - annoying. What is worse is that the pulls on the zippers are too short, they unravel and are lost.This is a preventable problem and I should not have to buy pulls for the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Neil L. Yuzuk

customer_reviews.title: Not The Size I Was Expecting
customer_reviews.text: When I Search For Tactical Backpack on Amazon.com I Found This One - Liking The Price and the Looks and Not Paying Attention To The Actual Size Ended Up Costing Me. This "Tactical" Bag Is Way Too Small For My Needs, It's Unfortunate Because Other Than The Size Of It (Or Lack Thereof) It's a Nicely Put Together Bag... I'm Just Using It Now For a Range Bag - I Have Ammo, Eye Protection, Spare Magazines For My S&W M&P Shield 2.0 and/or Springfield Armory XD Mod 2, It Isn't Large Enough To Fit My Ear Protection, Though...
customer_reviews.author: Timothy N.

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Just came today and I can already tell we're not going to be best friends. It will make good for a small hand gun going to the range. But as for anything else I wouldn't find nothing else good for it. Oh it would make a coffee little back pack for a kindergartener I suppose. But I'll keep it and see what I can do work it. It must definitely won't hold all my medical great at all which is what iv really wanted it for
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Solid option for a mirror less camera case.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it as a camera bag. In the two smaller pockets I can fit 2 spare batteries, battery charger, tripod quick mount (or my small gorilla tri-pod) lens cleaner solution, lens cloth, and my kit lens. While shooting the main pack can fit two lenses plus a third lens on the camera body with easy access during my shoot. During traveling the pack can hold 5 lenses and the camera body. My favorite thing about this pack is that you can wear it on your back and quickly sling it under your arm for fast access right under one's nose. I also appreciate that it doesn't look like a normal camera bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great "mans" diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a a diaper bag to keep in my truck. My wife's diaper bags are about the size of a laptop bag, but I wanted something smaller and that wasn't pink or baby blue! This is just barely large enough to hold 4 diapers (2 for a toddler, 2 for a newborn), wipes, 2 baby bottles, a water bottle, and a tupperware container of dry formula mix. The extra pockets still have room for some other random small things like hair ties and tissues. If I only had one kid, this would probably be large enough to toss an extra set of clothes in too.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Cool budget sling pack
customer_reviews.text: I was able to fit my glock 30, an extra mag, pocket knife and flashlight, and a tiny first aid altoids kit... This past month, I randomly decided to use this for a fishing trip. I was able to fit a clear flat plano box filled with fishing lures, a scissor and a plier into this little pack. I think I would've been able to fit more things if I didnt use that plano box but it worked out for me that weekend. For the price, it was worth it. Well made pack.
customer_reviews.author: Locdawg

customer_reviews.title: ... it for work as a security bag and I love it. Have to take away a star because ...
customer_reviews.text: Use it for work as a security bag and I love it. Have to take away a star because the clip broke right after I got it and now it is almost unusable. GREAT customer service here from G4 after writing the review about the broken part I got a very genuine email from them to help and replace my favorite bag. Amazing customer service and the new bag has been working great!!!! Thanks so much for the amazing customer service to your valued customers. Will be buying from again.
customer_reviews.author: VinylAnt

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. Material and overall quality is certainly comparable to expensive name brands like 5.11 and maxpedition. I was extremely impressed with the quality, and it has held up as my EDC. Currently using to carry daily essentials and a glock 9mm. One downside noticed is there isnt a place for Ids and cards that is quickly accessible. Currently I have them in the front zipper portion of the bag, but have to dig through to get to them which can be annoying. Other than that, this thing is as good as the 100 dollar version sold by maxpedition!
customer_reviews.author: Savanna

customer_reviews.title: This one I am very thankful I found
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my most favorite orders ever on Amazon. This bag is everything I needed for my job it's small enough but still room for everything and made tough..as nails..if you are even considering if you are fortunate enough to have found this product and if you have half a need or desire for it ...buy it ..yes feel confident in this product as a true 5 and worth every dollar of the crazy fair price...
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Well put together little pack
customer_reviews.text: This pack is good for an EDC bag. I use it to carry my IV medication, a bag of saline and my IV pump with some spare room for other items. The molle system allows you to add pockets and pouches to it, which allows expansion of the carrying capability. It's a little small, the person in the photo must have been a smaller individual but it's a good bag. I gave it four stars because sometimes the zipper likes to kink if you zip it to fast. I would NOT use this in a combat situation, however, as an EDC bag for everyday use, this bag fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Tara and John Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what needed - better than expected
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it’s hard to beat this bag. It is perfect for what I need it for, which is heading to the range with a pistol. If you're looking at the bag and trying to get a feel for how big it is, check the video. I put 300 rounds of ammo, my 9mm G17, 3 magazines, wallet, earplugs, safety glasses, a banana, and still had some room left over. I could probably put some compact ear muffs in. There are some nice hooks and velcro to customize it. It exceeded my expectations. Hard to beat for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold some essentials while my wife and I went out on small hikes. We don't want to carry heavy, but everyone should carry some water, a small medical kit, paper, pens/pencils and other miscellaneous stuff needed. Whatever you need to carry. This has worked out perfect for our needs and will also come in handy for festivals, car shows and other places we visit throughout summer and fall. The product feels well made. I've waited to write this review for about a week so that I could put it through a few small minor tests. This is a great product for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: Started Out Good
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the bag at first. I held everything that I needed even if it was a little tight. Sadly, I checked it today, and the seams have split in one of the bottom corners. It’s only been 6 months, and the bag rarely leaves the backseat of my truck. I wasn’t expecting Maxpedition quality, but I expected more than 7 months with very little use.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great for the traveler
customer_reviews.text: I am a frequent airplane traveler and have a need to have those essential items like mini flashlight, chap stick, handy wipes, Kindle tablet, charging accessories (international travelers know what I'm referring to) parachute cord, a few carabiners, water bottle, passport and other miscellaneous, I need it when I hit the ground stuff at my fingertips. This bag does it all. Easy to open and just the right sized pockets. A must have bag that is durable and versatile. The color selections make it easy to not be conspicuous.
customer_reviews.author: PaBusa52

customer_reviews.title: Great, but the zipper..?
customer_reviews.text: At first when I opened it, it’s smaller then you think, even for knowing you are ordering a small pack. The strap looks rather large compared to the tiny back pack.... but I ended up using it and wow, it works pretty good. The main zipper after two days of use is starting to have trouble opening. I checked to make sure it clean, and it is, just the zipper quality I’m scared it’s gonna stop working soon. It takes like 7 seconds of fiddling with it before I can get it to zip closed.will five star if it last a good while.
customer_reviews.author: samul solis

customer_reviews.title: fit my need perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This was my reorder and it works perfectly for my intended use. Since I have a CC license but can't find the appropriate holster, this not only allows me to stay armed but carry extra ammo, a cleaning kit and other additional tools PLUS still has room for other articles I use throughout the day. It is not the huge thing the picture might elude or have you believe but it is bigger than my return. Hanging it across my chest makes every thing quickly accessible yet small enough not to be cumbersome and get in the way. My compact Sig P320 sits very comfortably in the pocket I lined using a modified soft case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sling (for the price).
customer_reviews.text: Only used it a few times but it seems good so far. It could be better but for $16 I can't really complain. Almost took off a star because there should be more small external pockets and internal pockets/sleeves. I have a bunch of small tools to keep in the bag and they end up jumbled together in the bottom rather than nicely organized but it's not the end of the world.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Great looks and function.
customer_reviews.text: I’m quite happy with this bag. It’s similar to a more expensive one I’ve had at a fraction of the price and seems well made for it’s price. You can squeeze a nice amount of things in it as well. I cannot speak on its water resistance or long term durability yet but as time goes on I will update. It seems it would handle some splashes or light rain ok but I don’t think you’d want it getting soaked without a rain cover. I believe from my initial use it will hold up well. Great day bag that I plan to use daily as my man purse.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Maxpedition Remora Gunslinger Lookalike
customer_reviews.text: This is a very inexpensive lookalike to the Maxpedition Remora Gunslinger Every Day Carry bag. Its made with far less high quality components, so I don't expect this to last, but for the fire sale price I got it for, it'll do for basic carrying of items for me. That said, I also purchased the much more expensive Maxpedition aforementioned bag and it is made with the highest quality material and I won't need to worry about it falling apart, ever. Bottom Line: it'll do for the short run, but not the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Mid-Atlantic Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Let The Size Fool You
customer_reviews.text: I got my tactical bag/backpack just the other day. At first, I thought it was a bit too small for my needs, but I was wrong. It's not a very big bag, but there is lots and lots of space for everything. I'm able to fit my wallet, keys, cellphone and other sundries in this bag with room to spare. There is also room for my .38 SW revolver, which is the main reason that I bought this bag. It's light weight and you can either fling it over your shoulder or wear it as a backpack. My only regret is that I didn't buy one of these sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Honorary Southerner

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great Product for the price. Fabric and stitching arrived in good shape and appears to be good quality. There aren't any loose fibers inside at the stitches. Strap could be a little more comfortable but you really can't complain fro the $13. I am using this to hold all of my muzzleloading gear for the range and hunting. It holds my powder, primers, bullets, cleaners, patches, and brushes easily and has plenty space left for tubes of pre-measured powder. If the need arises to build another little kit of sorts, I won't hesitate to purchase this pack again.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great EDC and general storage Bag for on the Go!
customer_reviews.text: I've seen the same style bag on Wish and other online vendors but this is a really good quality made bag. It is small but that's what I was looking for. I'm a big guy so the strap is a good fit and doesn't seem too short or low quality. I haven't used it in the rain or gotten it wet but it holds up well for everyday use. Love some of the features to keep the bag clean and organized. If you're looking for a nice small day bag for errands or an EDC, I recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: TheDonJose

customer_reviews.title: zippers terrible
customer_reviews.text: Zippers of very poor quality and difficult to open/close. If were free would still be a bad deal.
customer_reviews.author: RBH

customer_reviews.title: Workhorse of a sling!
customer_reviews.text: I must have purchased the wrong sling accidentally. I wanted this bag as a range bag to hold my handgun, ammo, ear and eye protection. I thought this one had the Velcro handgun holster in the back pocket but it does not. It holds a ton and is a very well made sling. I really like the bungee option to hold an extra water bottle or a light jacket. However I bought it specifically because I thought it had the Velcro holster. I think I may return it.
customer_reviews.author: Rover Gurl

customer_reviews.title: compact and spacious at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tactical bag. It holds my G3, magazines, ammo.... and I can just swing it over my shoulder so it hangs at my side. I have the G3 holstered inside... trigger safe, ETC. Love the green color. I normally go with black but thought I would do something different.. and I am pleased with my purchase. It is sturdy, thick fabric, and zippers are all functional, not sticking. I think it will last quite a long time. check it out! :)
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: Would defiantly not recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: POS. Side ripped out after 2 days of hiking. Would defiantly not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool little bag, good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great size if you just want a convenient little pack for some essentials without taking a full backpack. The sling style is convenient as well to just swivel around to your stomach to quickly access something. The price is great and so far the quality seems fine I haven't found any issues. Not much else to say, if it looks cool to you and you want a compact little sling bag... buy it! If you hate it when it arrives, return it! I bet you'll keep it though.
customer_reviews.author: Sean D.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic EDC bag-great price-good quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag to carry whatever I need to go to my boat that I don’t leave on it, like keys, wallet, sunglasses, hat, utility knife, extra sunblock, VHF radio- all with plenty of room to spare. Super comfortable to carry with the shoulder strap. I will probably pick up another one for work. If my review was useful, please consider selecting the helpful button. Thanks and happy shopping.
customer_reviews.author: iamnoman

customer_reviews.title: Great EDC bag for the price and excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for EDC. Holds everything I need to carry, IPad Mini, portable battery with charging cables, Bluetooth headphones with case, COVID 19 masks, 8x5 notebook, pens, utility knife with bits, tactical flashlight, keys, cellphone and wallet. It still has room for more too. The material seems very durable and looks like it should last awhile. There’s others that are similar but are bigger, this one is just the size I was looking for. I’m thinking of adding a molle water bottle holder to the side. You can’t beat the price for the size and quality of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: CMack55

customer_reviews.title: Best bag for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Found this a while ago to try it out and loved it so much I ordered another. Great bag capacity and multiple organization options. I use it as a range bag or light excursions. Durability seems good and I do not worry about babying it. I can not talk about water resistance as I use baggies inside it during wet weather as an old practice. Pistols and Pmags fit just fine with room to spare. It is simply the best bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sheck

customer_reviews.title: Biggest little bag I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Needed two carriers. Was concerned if the size of this would be sufficient for my needs on our trips to the range.... So I bought this for my wife... However when it arrived what I discovered was that I can carry my S/W Model 19 - 357mag. My Rossi 4" 38 Special. A box of ammo for each. My ear muffs and My glasses - Perfecto... My wife takes only one gun so it works quite well for her needs... Seems to be very well made and should last for quite a while.. So right now I'm ordering a second one (different color) for me... .... My second one came today. Can't say enough about this product... Highly recommended...
customer_reviews.author: Burger Flipper

customer_reviews.title: Nice Size
customer_reviews.text: Got this for use as a low profile camera bag for my mirrorless camera. Definitely the perfect size for a Lumix GX85 plus two lenses. I walked all around NYC and actually got a couple of compliments on how nice the bag looked! Definitely did not look like a camera bag which is what I planned. I'm probably going to order it in another color as well as it is hard to find bags in this size.
customer_reviews.author: MickeyFanTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I got this because it had good reviews and was a great price. Since then I've used it for a camera bag, fishing, day pack for hikes, snack/water carrier during a trip to a water park and hauling all my chargers and cords and contact solution on a weekend trip. It's sturdy enough for all of that and more. There are several zippered pockets and can fit an Amazon Fire HD 10 perfectly in the main section. I may get another one since my daughter has decided it's just right for her bug-out bag.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the size I expected. Even after reading the dimensions and looking at reviews and pictures I still was very disappointed in the amount of storage capacity this can handle. I'm just planning on giving it to my stepson as a play army backpack. I was going to use this as a emergency backpack and put all my bug out and Emergency Equipment in but I won't even be able to fit 1 emergency fire starting kit and one emergency pot and pan into it without it being full.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Huegel

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, versatile. Only issue I had was the overpowering chemical smell. I tried letting it sit in the sun, sprayed some fabric freshener, nothing helped. The smell has finally faded-a little. I am keeping the bag because it is very handy and I like that the sling can be moved from the right to the left side, or the strap can be taken off completely. I haven’t tested if it is waterproof but there is a hole in the bottom, not sure what the purpose is.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Easily broken on clip
customer_reviews.text: It easily broken on clip especially an essential feature of the bag. I'm not sure if it's just a faulty one and if seller will be giving me a new one
customer_reviews.author: Tristan San Juan

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and well made bag. I wanted it for my small game hunting bag. Light, easy to store a first aid kit, fire starter kit, knife(s), handwarmers, etc. Everything fit easily and it's comfortable over my shoulder. Really is a good bag at a great price. Nothing I would change and I look forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Rene A Martinez

customer_reviews.title: This is my EDC man-bag, every day
customer_reviews.text: Love the organization and expandability. I have added a molle phone case and magazine pouch which BTW holds either a Leatherman wave, Buck 110, or an Opinel No. 9 easily and securely. The main compartment easily fits a Bullet Journal and/ an iPad mini. I did find I was not a fan of the cross back carry. Luckily the oem carry strap is removeable and I got a traditional shoulder strap to use instead. It is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: CMA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product. Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very durable material. Strong. Size is good. Not perfect but good enough to carry your basic needs. I took mine camping the same day I received it. I was able to fit my Motorola 2 way radios, Gerber multi-tool, knives, compass, maps, water, laser pen, flashlight, ropes, anchors, gloves, extra cap, and more stuff. carried on the front when I was installing my tent since I had stuff that I needed to be accessible to my hands, and I carried it in the back when I went hiking the next morning. Great product, good size. I bought three, one for me and two gifts for my friends, but I am buying more for gifts. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Right size and does the job...
customer_reviews.text: if you are looking for a guy-purse this is a great alternative to the messenger bag. Well constructed and of sufficient size to carry all the essentials that otherwise are crammed in pockets. I really dislike my pockets packed with wallet, keys, phone, etc. this works great.
customer_reviews.author: CabinInTheWoods

customer_reviews.title: Not durable workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product, only to have TWO seams come apart beyond repair, making it worthless. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: JoeNautilus

customer_reviews.title: Meh... Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Good bag so far the stitching looks a lot better then I have seen in this price point. With the molle I just have to buy a pouch for each side and its a perfect truck bag. The Major down side is the strap it has NO PADDING AT ALL and rips into your neck and collar bone. I just ordered a shoulder strap pad which was almost the same price I bought the bag for. So if you are looking for a bag this style then I would say look for one that has a padded strap. even if it is more money I promise it would be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Pack is holding up great under some serious abuse
customer_reviews.text: Pack is holding up great under some serious abuse. i have treated it as roughly as possible simply because i want it to look and feel "broken in" so my review is a great thumbs up. good stitching and fabric, zippers are durable. great storage areas. I love this pack and G4Free sent a follow up E-mail asking how I like my purchase. and made it clear to contact customer service if I had any issues. for a pack priced under $20 I think that is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Zombienkongen

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart fast
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé bought this bag to use as a purse. She absolutely loved it, but after less than a month a hole formed at the top. The company states they want you to be happy so we are reaching out. Will update after we hear back. As of now it should have been way sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: carlos.castillophotography

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I work in tv production and often have to have a walkie talkie on me. I also like to be able to carry my wallet, keys, pens, pencils, a bottle of water, etc. on my person, but I hate the clunkiness of a full sized backpack and the smallness of a purse. This bag works perfectly to hold all the above listed items and *more*! I also love the quick release tab for easy removal.
customer_reviews.author: chixx058

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoulder pack for emergency kit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because it was the perfect size for me to store in my motorcycle saddle bag. I was looking for a single shoulder pack. I use it for a multipurpose emergency road kit. Just the right size to take on a hike. Very durable strong zippers. Plenty of room for what I needed - First Aid items and travel items like flashlight, duck tape, pocket knife, etc.. Even a good size pocket for your concealed carry firearm. Great price for what you get. And with Molle webbing you have the option to attach more than what fits inside.
customer_reviews.author: Ric Noble

customer_reviews.title: Extremely handy pack that appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised for the price. Lots of room for things. Someone said they were surprised it was small. The measurements are in the listing. Many pockets, it is comfortable to wear, and once on I hardly notice it is there. Now if someone could tell me what the snap is for.... Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas

customer_reviews.title: Also I needed an extra strap around my waste to stabilize it while I'm working
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it to install cabinets. It works well after small modifications. It holds my hand-tools such as screwdrivers, tape measure stud finder, gloves and some other stuff. Pros: made well strong material (I used to use tool aprons but they don't last ). Small enough to not get in my way while working, yet big enough to hold all the necessary tools on me. Cons: the strap needed a pad bcause the nylon material cut into my neck ( I made a sleeve of an old sweatshirt). Also I needed an extra strap around my waste to stabilize it while I'm working.
customer_reviews.author: Amir Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Backpack with Plenty of Features
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is exactly what I was looking for! I like the small size and that you can completely hide the shoulder strap in a pouch on the back of the pack that snaps closed. The zippers seem sturdy and it has plenty of d-rings and molle straps to attach things. Overall, it is a well-constructed, versatile pack that I'm very happy with. I will be using it every day. I highly recommend you get one!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great bag with what seems like endless pockets
customer_reviews.text: I am using this bag to carry my Go Pro and all accessories like selfie sticks and tripods and batteries. it has storage for all of that and then some. You could even use this as a fishing bag. It fell overboard on my kayak one day and came out of the water just fine. Even my batteries were still functional after taking a dip.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Mihara

customer_reviews.title: Luv at first sight!
customer_reviews.text: Looks very well made, tons of space, 3 compartments. The outermost pocket fits an IPhone 7 Plus comfortably. Second compartment is bigger still with a little pocket and then the large, main compartment, big enough for my Horizon Kompakt 35mm camera and tons of space left. Much better than even a small bag pack. And quicker access to stuff if worn on my chest. Luv it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for taking it out places to hold your stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have my wallet, keys, I phone 8 plus (one of the biggest Iphones ever made), notepad, and pen in this bag every time I go out so I don't loose anything and sag my shorts down from the weight of my stuff. No fraying to be seen after months, and it's comfortable to have on your shoulder. Does not look weird to carry around while in public.
customer_reviews.author: ETHAN CROWN

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for hunting accessories
customer_reviews.text: I just received this bag and am impressed at what $17 got me. The quality seems good and there are several features to make this the perfect bag for carrying in and out of the woods. There's plenty of room for licenses, calls, poncho, wallet, phone, keys, etc. Being able to keep so much in one place will be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: BG2

customer_reviews.title: A small carabiner helps
customer_reviews.text: This has proven to be very handy carrying various smaller items while day hiking. It is also holding up nicely. I would make one suggestion if you want to wear this behind you and it keeps sliding forward or off of your shoulder. A carabiner clipped through the open D-ring at the bottom and a belt loop on your pants if available has solved this problem nicely for me. If wearing on the right side I clip it to the left rear belt loop etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love this little bag
customer_reviews.text: Like I said this is a little But hey what do you expect for 15 bucks. It will hold a hand gun and plenty of ammo plus cleaning gear and some other small items. Not a whole lot of room but it good for a day at the range. I'm a diabetic and I am thinking of getting another one for my travel bag. It is well made of good material and should last a long time. A good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Well built and practical
customer_reviews.text: I like it! I dare anyone to call it a purse. Seriously, that's the main reason I chose this thing--I don't want whatever I carry to be mistaken for a purse (and yes, I'm female). But I love that it can stand on its own, it has a handle, is the perfect size, and appears to be rugged and sturdy. I'll update this review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: arbie

customer_reviews.title: It also has enough room for a few snacks and a lot of attachment points for things like drinks, maps
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I had in mind for my future forays into the wilds searching for big ones. It will carry the lures and tools that I consider to be most necessary along with a few extras. It also has enough room for a few snacks and a lot of attachment points for things like drinks, maps, and flashlights. Lots of pockets too. Can be slung over either shoulder and carried in back or front. Seems to be pretty rugged as well.
customer_reviews.author: Barney meighen

customer_reviews.title: Initially a good bag
customer_reviews.text: Very good EDC bag. I use this bag ever day. It hasnt let me down yet. There are a few loose strands but they do not affect performance. This bag is well built and will last a long time Update: i used this bag for a few months now and 2 small tears have appeared on the sides. It doesnt seem to be spreading but still. It's a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Wenzel I.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great quality for price, but missing some important features.
customer_reviews.text: I was stunned at how well made this is for the price. Sturdy material, smooth zippers, comfy, etc. But it was missing some important features, especially velcro-style loop fabric in the CCW pocket. Just dropping your piece in there without a way to secure it in a holster is asking for trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again with a different color. Purchase grade. "A"
customer_reviews.text: I like this! Its compact. Easy to carry, lots of pockets and straps to hold things down. Feels durable. Sorta stuff at first but that went away. I have to much stuff on me when I leave house. Pants pockets have limited space, back packs have to much. This really fits right in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Utilitarian in the best way
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd backpack that I've ordered because I absolutely love them. I use one for work and another for regular shopping and running around. They are incredibly well made and specifically the one that I use for work gets a beating, but you would never know it by looking at it. They last forever. Great utilitarian bag.
customer_reviews.author: Catattack

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a useful bag for both personal and work
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag at work for to hold tools and first aid. I'm not easy on it and it has been holding up very well. I enjoy all the straps on it. It holds my writing tools and knife. There is enough room inside that its not difficult to organize and keep in reach. Even though it sounds like its this large bag, it is actually very compact and great for utility usage.
customer_reviews.author: AvaleeAngel

customer_reviews.title: Nice but small
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I sent this little back pack back as it really is too small. I don't carry a weapon but it will not even carry my lunch or a bottle of water. It really is small. Nice quality and all but it looks like a doll back pack on me. I was hoping for something a bit bigger. Sent it back and will keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for my work pack. I build roofing trusses. Didn’t need a big bag just something to hold pens, tape measure, and other small tools. Outer built in straps were perfect as well for my hammer and framing square to hang on securely and not rattle around and fall off. Been using it for a few months. Greatly surprised by its durability and capacity. Perfect size when you don’t need to carry a full size pack.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Good for hiking & dog walking. Easily fits keys, wallet, poop bags, and a water bottle with room to spare. Zoom in on the picture to see how it fits. My husband says this is better for flat terrain because it does slide when going up and down hills.
customer_reviews.author: mpage

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this pack!
customer_reviews.text: Just opened it today and have been using it all day. I ride a motorcycle and it makes it very convenient to carry multiple things on my chest rather than having to stop and retrieve them from my saddlebags. If it breaks or gets lost I will definitely buy another one. I've purchased many packs in the past, but this one I'll stick with.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ragland

customer_reviews.title: nice small backpack
customer_reviews.text: i dig it. will hold a lot of things. i carry it everywhere. have to put the conceal in the inside tho as it is very ovbious if you try to put it in the back compartment. easy to size the strap. great value for the money. unsure on the water resistance part, but gave it 5 stars anyhow. there are eyelets in the bottom, i assume to act as drain holes should it get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W.

customer_reviews.title: Little to complain about.
customer_reviews.text: Read the first few words of product description,SMALL is the key word.read the dimensions people.perfect for work use.mine carries phone charger,daily meds,snacks,blagh,blagh,and don't laugh but a extra pair of underwear.I have had this bag for several months now and it's holding up fine.like anything else with a zipper,don't be abusive.no complaints,great little bag for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: lab2953

customer_reviews.title: Well it was great, then it wasn’t.
customer_reviews.text: This was great to use as a purse. Loved it better than anything I’ve used. Then I washed it once and the entire side split and frayed where I can’t sew it. Update: I did contact the company and they are offering to replace the product for free so if that happens I’ll have to bump em up for customer service. Update: company has apologized for defective product and shipped a new one free of charge. Good customer service!
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the disc golfer
customer_reviews.text: This pack is perfect for my disc golf kit! The main pouch holds 5 regulation discs and I can get my super secret putter disc in the back pouch. I added a mole water bottle holder and this pack is ready for the toughest course. The two remaining pouches leave room for your snacks, score cards, and marker disc I highly Recommend this pack for the disc golfer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Best bag of its type
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two of these bags so far, one black and one tan. The black bag I've had since 2017 and is still going strong albeit a little fading as it live on my motorcycle so it gets a lot of sun, turns to a deep purple. Tan bag is proving to be of the same quality as the last bag. No problems with either so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for fly fishing to replace the small simms waste pack that I have. I was tired of my bad getting soaked if I went over my belt so I figured this would fit the bill. There wasn’t as much room in the main compartment as my Simms pack so I added two of my tactical pouches off of my airsoft loadout and now I have lots of room to spare! I love the od green color and it’s a perfect match for my other pouches!
customer_reviews.author: sgtbowhunter

customer_reviews.title: You have to fight the zipper every time.
customer_reviews.text: You have to fight the zipper every time. Extra fabric adjasent to the zipper gets caught in it. No reason for that to be there. Just lack of attention to details.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon cruiser

customer_reviews.title: Well worth is
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome. It’s exactly what I needed and wanted for my edc bag. It holds everything I’ve already been carrying in an old lunch pale. Which is surprisingly the same size. But this has all the compartments and pockets to keep things in order and keep track of what you need and know you have. This is well worth the money for the quality. This is just a carry bag for me mostly gonna stay in the car and not really go thru a wild environment so I know it will last .every human should have this bag on there person
customer_reviews.author: pasitalredy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bag. My wife wanted to get a small ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. My wife wanted to get a small bag for Disney World. I figured that I would be the one that would have to lug it around, so I picked out this one. Being an Army Veteran I really like the look of it. The quality is great. The only complaint is the zipper handles have 550 cord that comes untied easily. It is now my everyday work bag. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: 13Foxtrot

customer_reviews.title: good day pack to keep valuables secure and more convenient than a back pack
customer_reviews.text: This is a good day pack for a low price. It's a good size for a pad, phone, notepad, pens and pencils, perhaps drawing and sketching materials, camera, small binoculars, etc. It's a good way to keep small valuables in sight and secure since it's generally under your arm. It's very good when you don't have enough stuff to need a back pack but too much for your pockets.
customer_reviews.author: elite194

customer_reviews.title: Tiny pack, big value.
customer_reviews.text: Great little pack arrived in the mail yesterday. I expected something less for the price I paid, so I’m pretty impressed with the quality and craftsmanship for $18. Really going to enjoy all the possible carrying configurations, and the size is absolutely perfect for a day hike.
customer_reviews.author: vasiliki gianakos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Small Backpack for Hiking
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful backpack. Well made, seems to be waterproof, sturdy, lots of room, and the zippers don't jam! However, it's a lot smaller than I expected. That's entirely my fault for not checking the product size though- and I still have been using it every day when I hike, so I'm happy. Overall, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kaycee F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tactical Bag
customer_reviews.text: This tactical bag is just the right size for personal items like wallet, keys, compass, flashlight, map, cell phone, snacks, ect......and also my 9mm personal protection while I am hiking! I love the Molle system and the durability of the tactical bag! The variable positions for the carry straps are convientient and easy to use and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Railey

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just got this bad boy, have to say I’m impressed with the quality right away. Time will tell as I plan on using this quite a bit for the range and, because it’s small, bike rides. It will be my everyday bag. Way better than lugging my backpack around. I will update in a bit.
customer_reviews.author: ozz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good size!
customer_reviews.text: When I received the bag I was not expecting it to be as large as it was. Not saying its a huge bag, just larger than I thought. It has a number of pockets some zippered some not. It has enough to actually organize whatever your putting in the bag. I can fit my wallet into the bag with ease and still have room for other items in the main area. Like the description said you can store a tablet in it without issue. Overall it is a good quality bag that does survive my adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffinee

customer_reviews.title: RIP RIP RIP
customer_reviews.text: POOR QUALITY, SEWING MATTERS ON THESE THINGS. MINE BUSTED AT THE SEAMS LEAVING A FIVE RIP. AFTER 2 MONTHS USE. I'M HERE LOOKING SOME OTHER BRAND IT - NOT GOING TO BE ANOTHER G4. DON'T THINK AMAZON WOULD TAKE IT BACK.
customer_reviews.author: AIKIT

customer_reviews.title: Good style, horrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: This bag held up for about 5 months of about every day use as just an over the shoulder medical bag. It held a small notebook, emergency medicine, and a glucose kit. The bottom corner of the bag where the strap clips to broke off within the first few months. All of the zipper pulls came off. I love the style of this bag and the size of it, everything was perfect except for the quality of the bag. :(
customer_reviews.author: altwenter

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this little bag. I use it for all my diabetes management stuff. Even mine has a defect I still rate it as a 5 star, and the problem with mine is that when you take off the strap and you are going to used it as a briefcase type the snap button don’t snap. So on mine always have to use it as a bag pack. Wish the vendor will say anything about it on how to solve it.
customer_reviews.author: Jac012

customer_reviews.title: Excellent EDC Bag
customer_reviews.text: Just received my bag today. I love that it’s just the right size for what I need to carry every day. There’s plenty of storage space and I had a good chunk of room left over in the main portion of the bag that I can place other items in. It’s really a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Harris

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: meh............Typical Chinese construction.......Used this bag one time at the Arnold Sports Classic in Toledo Ohio. EVERY ONE of the pull strings on the zippers came off. How hard is it to tie a knot? Aside from that, this seems to be fairly well constructed-just keep in mind it is of Chinese construction, and it's quality is in keeping with that. I wouldn't buy another one, but I can make this one work for what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Gary McMurtrie

customer_reviews.title: Great pack at an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a smaller, yet slightly larger than a fanny pack for hunting. I was leery of this pack because it was priced so inexpensively. AMAZING pack! The quality is great, it is very well built. The size for me was perfect. The molle system is going to allow for versatility. If I was to change anything on the pack it would be to allow the main pocket zipper to open slightly more, maybe another 1" tops. But obviously that is a personal preference on how I wish to access my gear. Great pack at an amazing price!
customer_reviews.author: Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed bought 2 in the last 9 months seams rip open
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I’ve bought in 9 months .. love the concept. But it is truly military grade it’s disappointing the seams keep fraying open the zipper seams rip open . Maybe sooner or later I will purchase one that doesn’t rip out
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good little bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is small, but you can really pack a lot of stuff in it. The quality is great. An iPad mini fits perfectly in two locations in the biggest part. I used the pocket closest to inside (side to your back), but the outer pocket of the same section fits it too. This is the perfect size for an emergency bag, or EDC. Not "bug out bag" size, but plenty of room for small med kit, fire starting essentials, small folding camp shovel, multi-tools, and a few other emergency items.
customer_reviews.author: P. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality fabric. If you want a small pack for carrying more than you want in your pockets, this is a great sling bag. Wear across front for more security, or across the back like a backpack. Or more casually, over one shoulder. Zippers are a little tough around the corners, but no big deal (I'll probably use some candle wax on them to ease the force needed to round the corners.)
customer_reviews.author: NottaGeek

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Roomy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much just wanted a range bag instead of using a backpack and for the price I figured I would grab one of these. Theres actually a LOT of storage space and plenty of different compartments. It has the obvious tactical/military aesthetic but can be used for so much more.
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo

product_meta.title: G4Free Outdoor Tactical Bag Backpack, Military Sport Bag Pack Sling Shoulder Backpack Tactical Satchel for Every Day Carry
feature_bullets: ★★ SMALL&LIGHTWEIGHT: 7.87*5.51*9.87 inches (L*W*H).Weight: 8oz.Volume: 7L or so. Multiple internal pockets and three external compartments, one front zippered pocket, one main zippered pocket, one padded back pocket, compact enough to keep your necessities organized.
★★ MULTIPURPOSE: Used for EDC sling pack, chest bag, hand bag, tactical cross body pack, pouch, first-aid kit, diaper bag and so on. It is very handy and convenient.

★★ DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Made from upgraded 600D polyester fabric - Lightweight, durable material. Double zip closure, padded heavy duty handle and upgraded stitching make it possible for your daily bag.

★★ HUMANLIZED DESIGN: Two clips on the two sides make it switched between left or right hand side, suiting your body shape. Besides, The fixing magic sticker on the back pocket can hold the strap convenient for a hand bag.
★★ GOOD COMPANION: Great for indoor and outdoor uses including camping, hiking, hunting, sports events, school supplies, tools, Etc. Good choice for a gift.
